Nerangs.ab: yaθā ahū vairiiō čahār bār ḫāndan va hum va urvarān kuftan b-āb-e zur andar kardan va hum pyāle kardan be yaθā ahū vairiiō har čahār yaθā ahū vairiiō hamčenin bāyad kard

"He should recite four times the Yaθā ahū vairiiō, pound the hum and urvarān and pour it into the the zur-water and do it thorugh the hum-pyāle. He much do it in the same way dring the recitation of the four Yaθā Ahū Vairiiō."
